about_the_game:
High-intensity dungeon crawler that fuses chaos with extraction shooter. When your spaceship’s Reality Drive malfunctions, Reality Shards scatter across strange and dangerous universes. Stranded, you must fight through bizarre worlds, battle fierce creatures, and gather the shards needed to repair your ship and find your way home.

Each dungeon in Reality Core is procedurally generated, ensuring a unique and fresh experience every time you play. From eerie undead catacombs, haunted libraries and entire planets made of food, every dungeon is unique.

Encounter everything from relentless zombies to mystical eyeball-mages and even sentient pizza. These diverse creatures are determined to protect the coveted Reality Shards that have recently fallen into their dungeons, presenting a formidable obstacle to your quest.

Play as an intrepid interdimensional traveler, equipped with a vast arsenal of weapons, power-ups, and items. You must navigate and conquer the treacherous dungeons, overcoming each universe's challenges to ultimately return to your own reality.

At its core, Reality Core is a looter shooter, offering a staggering collection of unique guns and items to collect. From standard firearms like shotguns, SMGs, and semi-automatic rifles to more unconventional and... imaginative weaponry. Unleash eggs from chickens, explosive needles from cacti, and more as you battle your way through the multiverse.

Embark on an exhilarating adventure in Reality Core, where every dungeon, enemy, and weapon brings a new level of excitement and challenge. Will you gather enough Reality Shards to repair your ship and find your way back home? The multiverse awaits your courage and skill.

name: Reality Core

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

reviews:
“This feels like Gungeon meets Issac in the best way”
10/10 – Quick
short_description: Blast through chaotic dungeons and unleash powerful weapons as you journey through the multiverse in search of a way home. Dodge, loot, and survive against deadly foes, extracting hard-won treasures to repair your ship and make it back!
